original_text: But Barzillai answered the king, “How many more years will I live, that I should go up to Jerusalem with the king?
korean_text: 바르실래가 왕께 아뢰되 내 생명의 날이 얼마나 있사옵겠기에 어찌 왕과 함께 예루살렘으로 올라가리이까

sentences.original_text: How many more years will I live
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 얼마나 더 살 수 있을까요

sentences.original_text: that I should go up to Jerusalem with the king
